cheesyCrave.title: CHEESY CRAVE
cheesyCrave.desc: Gobon imsellem jintefa' fuq patty imbuhar, hobz imhammas, u bizzejjed crunch biex izomm kollox serju u sodisfacenti.

maximus.title: MAXIMUS
maximus.desc: Munzell gholi mimli bacon crispy, nachos crunch, gobon imsellem, u sawsijiet qawwija maghmula ghall-guh veru.

shorty.title: SHORTY
shorty.desc: Kompatt, imbuhar, u mimli toghma — burger zghir maghmul ghal daqqa hafifa minghajr ma jaqta' kantunieri fit-toghma.

brand.title: BURGERS SERJI. EBDA JOKES.
brand.description: Hawn f'Serious Burgers Only, niehu l-burgers bis-serjeta — ebda jokes, ebda shortcuts, ebda kompromessi. Ahna nistakkaw patties imbuhra, gobon imsellem, u ingredjenti qawwija f'kull burger, naghmu ikel li huwa qawwi fit-toghma u impossibbli li tinjoraw. Huwa fun, huwa messy, u huwa maghmul biex izommok gej lura ghal aktar!

classic.name: CLASSIC BURGER
classic.desc: Patty tal-laham imbuhar, cheddar imsellem, hobz imhammas, u toghmiet klassici maghmula sew.

classicPlus.name: CLASSIC PLUS
classicPlus.desc: Patties imbuhra doppji, cheddar imsellem extra, hobz imhammas, u sodisfazzjon akbar.

shorty.name: SHORTY
shorty.desc: Kompatt, imbuhar, u mimli toghma — burger zghir maghmul ghal daqqa hafifa minghajr ma jaqta' kantunieri fit-toghma.

loadedClassic.name: LOADED CLASSIC
loadedClassic.desc: Laham stacked gholi b'bacon, slaw, gobon imsellem, u sawsa, mibni messy, qawwi, u assolutament bla skuzi.

maximus.name: MAXIMUS
maximus.desc: Munzell gholi mimli bacon crispy, nachos crunch, gobon imsellem, u sawsijiet qawwija maghmula ghall-guh veru.

madman.name: MADMAN
madman.desc: Ribs bil-mod smoky stacked fuq laham imbuhar, gobon imsellem, slaw crunchy, u sawsa maghmula ghal madness assoluta.

cheesyCrave.name: CHEESY CRAVE
cheesyCrave.desc: Gobon imsellem jintefa' fuq patty imbuhar, hobz imhammas, u bizzejjed crunch biex izomm kollox serju u sodisfacenti.

sboTruffle.name: SBO TRUFFLE
sboTruffle.desc: Sawsa tat-truffle bl-art midfuna fil-laham imbuhar, gobon imsellem, u hobz imhammas, jaghti toghma fond b'tmiem smooth u lussuż.

classicChicken.name: CLASSIC CHICKEN
classicChicken.desc: Tgieg crispy, hass frisk, sawsa creamy, u hobz imhammas izomm kollox simplici u sodisfacenti.

chickNcheese.name: CHICK N CHEESE
chickNcheese.desc: Tgieg moqli dehbi mghobbi f'gobon imsellem, hobz artab, u daqqa creamy li tilhaq il-comfort l-ewwel u l-crunch direttament wara.

bigChick.name: BIG CHICK
bigChick.desc: Fillet tat-tgieg crispy massiv b'saff ta' gobon imsellem, sawsa qawwija, u crunch serju li ma zommx lura.

quotes.text: L-aqwa waqfa ta' burger fil-vjagg tieghi.
quotes.author: -Influencer tal-ikel tal-ivvjaggar

quotes.text: Gejt darba. Nibqa' nerga' nigi lura.
quotes.author: -Regolari li jhobb il-burgers
